page.title: 02St Pauls C of E School
page.content: {St Pauls Church of England School} in Swanley Village is 115 years old and is the oldest school in the area.There are 75 pupils - 40 boys and 35 girls-and three teachers including the Head teacher.The pupils ages range from 5-11 years.The school has a secretary,a caretaker,1 dinner supervisor and 1 kitchen lady.There is no hall or dinning room-meals are taken in the class rooms -and there are only outside toilets.The staff room is a seprate building which used to be an air-raid shelter.The school has a playground,a field and some woods.Their equipment consists of a video,computer,colour TV,1 radio and tape recorders.Lessons taught include reading,maths,English,science,art music and RE.PE is not taught as they have no hall,but games are taken on the field.
